text: Warren Alan James Clarke (26 April 1947 â€“ 12 November 2014) was an English actor from 1964 to 2014. He was known as Detective Superintendent Andy Dalziel in the TV series Dalziel and Pascoe and as Dim in the movie A Clockwork Orange. Clarke's first marriage ended in divorce. His second marriage ended in his death. He had a son by his first wife and a daughter by his second. On 12 November 2014, Clarke died in his sleep, after a short battle with pancreatic cancer in Beaconsfield, Buckinghamshire, England, aged 67. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Oldham
title: Warren Clarke
